requests
beautifulsoup4
pydub
datasets>=2.16.1
torch
torchcodec  # Required by datasets for audio processing
TTS
numpy
soundfile

# System Dependencies (install separately):
# - FFmpeg (required by torchcodec and pydub for audio processing)
#   macOS: brew install ffmpeg
#   Linux: apt-get install ffmpeg or yum install ffmpeg
#   Windows: Download from https://ffmpeg.org/download.html
#
# Note: PyTorch version compatibility with torchcodec:
# Check https://github.com/pytorch/torchcodec for compatible versions
